name: painting with a camera - Piece 01
description:
This painting is the result of an experiment using sunlight, movements, a camera and a tree (Caryocar brasiliense, also known as "pequizeiro").

The photograph is not photoshopped. The effects were achieved through long-exposure and other specific camera settings.

This is part of an 8-piece collection. Pieces 1-4 are collored and 5-8 are black & white. The first buyer of Piece 01 gets 1 edition of Piece 05.
